## FirestoreStateStore class

Implementation of flow state store that persistes flow state in Firestore.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class FirestoreStateStore implements FlowStateStore 
```
**Implements:** [FlowStateStore](./core.flowstatestore.md)
